Class Booker

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicketManager
      • Booker

  • public class Booker
extends TicketManager
    The Booker is the ticket-manager that handles the booking process. It manages seat reservation for new tickets, and processes the payments for these new tickets

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class TicketManager

        booking, cinema, show

      void addReservation(int row, int num)
      addReservation Create a temporary seat reservation Seats are temporarily reserved during the booking process.
      void finalizeCardPayment(java.lang.String referenceNumber)
      finalizeCardPayment Finalize the current booking Add seatReservations to the show and create the payment
      void finalizeCashPayment()
      finalizeCashPayment Finalize the current booking by cash Add seatReservations to the show convert all temporary reservations to tickets and record the payment

      get Booking
      java.util.List<Reservation> getReservations()

        Returns:
        Booking booking

      • addReservation

        public void addReservation(int row,
                           int num)
        addReservation Create a temporary seat reservation Seats are temporarily reserved during the booking process. These temporary reservations are stored in an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        row - int
        num - int

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation(int row,
                              int num)
        removeReservation Remove the selected reservation from the temporary reservations ArrayList. If the row/num combination is not found in the reservations ArrayList, do nothing
        Parameters:
        row - int
        num - int

      • getTotalPrice

        public float getTotalPrice()
        getTotalPrice Get the current price of the booking This value adjusts as reservations are added or removed
        Returns:
